name: Susan Ware Moses
bio: Susan Ware Moses was born on 12 April 1856, in Georgia, United States. She married James Richard Odom on 15 August 1873, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 10 sons and 1 daughter. She lived in Oaky Streak, Butler, Alabama, United States for about 10 years. She died on 9 May 1913, in Alabama, United States, at the age of 57, and was buried in Cantelous Cemetery, Montgomery, Alabama, United States.
